mapper.select: SELECT * FROM web_overtime ORDER BY over_seq

select o.over_seq as seq, o.reg_date as reg_dt, o.mod_date as mod_dt, e.emp_nm as emp_nm, d.duty_nm as emp_job , r.rank_nm as emp_pos , o.ot_Date as ot_dt,(o.ot_time_start || '~' || o.ot_time_end) as ot_tm, o.eat_Yn, o.status, o.content , ans from web_overtime o, web_empl_mgm e, web_rank_mgm r, web_duty_mgm d where o.over_seq = #{sequence} and o.emp_num = e.emp_seq and d.duty_seq = e.duty_seq and r.rank_seq = e.rank_seq
update web_overtime set mod_date=SYSDATE, ans=#{ans}, status=#{status} where over_seq= #{seq}

select count(o.over_seq) from web_overtime o, web_empl_mgm e, web_duty_mgm d, web_rank_mgm r where e.emp_nm LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' and o.reg_date BETWEEN to_date(#{startDate}) AND to_date(#{endDate}) and e.emp_seq = o.emp_num and d.duty_seq = e.duty_seq and r.rank_seq = e.rank_seq

select over_seq as seq, reg_date as reg_dt, mod_date as mod_dt, emp_nm as emp_nm, duty_nm as emp_job , rank_nm as emp_pos, to_char(ot_date, 'MM.dd(DY)') as ot_dt, ot_time as ot_tm, eat_yn, nvl(status, '대기중') as status, content, ans from ( select o.over_seq, o.reg_date, o.mod_date, e.emp_nm, d.duty_nm, r.rank_nm, o.ot_date, (o.ot_time_start || '~' || o.ot_time_end) as ot_time, o.eat_yn, o.status, o.content, o.ans, row_number() over ( order by ${orderKeyword} ${order}) as rnum FROM web_overtime o, web_empl_mgm e, web_rank_mgm r, web_duty_mgm d where e.emp_seq = o.emp_num AND e.duty_seq = d.duty_seq AND e.rank_seq = r.rank_seq AND (e.emp_nm LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') AND (o.reg_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate})) where rnum between #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} order by ${orderKeyword} ${order}

select over_seq as seq, reg_date as reg_dt, mod_date as mod_dt, emp_nm as emp_nm, duty_nm as emp_job , rank_nm as emp_pos, to_char(ot_date, 'MM.dd(DY)') as ot_dt, ot_time as ot_tm, eat_yn, nvl(status, '대기중') as status, content, ans from ( select o.over_seq, o.reg_date, o.mod_date, e.emp_nm, d.duty_nm, r.rank_nm, o.ot_date, (o.ot_time_start || '~' || o.ot_time_end) as ot_time, o.eat_yn, o.status, o.content, o.ans, row_number() over ( order by ${orderKeyword} ${order}) as rnum FROM web_overtime o, web_empl_mgm e, web_rank_mgm r, web_duty_mgm d where e.emp_seq = o.emp_num AND e.duty_seq = d.duty_seq AND e.rank_seq = r.rank_seq AND (e.emp_nm LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') AND (o.reg_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}))
